peril.model.combat

Class CombatRound

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.model.combat.CombatRound

  • public final class CombatRound
extends java.lang.Object
    Denotes a round of combat that can be processed by the CombatHelper.
    Since:
    2018-03-11
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    CombatHelper, ModelSquad, ModelCountry

    • Method Detail

      • checkState

        public void checkState()
        Checks that the following rules still remain true for the state of this CombatRound. If there is anything about this CombatRound that is not valid a appropriate exception will be thrown. Key Aspects:
        • The attacker and defender must be ruled by different players.
        • The attacker and defender must be neighbours with a valid link between them that allows an attack.
        • The attacker and defender must be different countries.
        • The attacker and defender squads must be different squads.
        • The attacker and defender squads must have a valid number of alive units in them.
        • The attacker and defender squads must not be empty.
